translation.footer_experienced_professional: Your work planned with an experienced professional
translation.register_description_p1: Architecture comprises the art or technique of designing a building or environment in which there is construction. The activity takes into account the principles, techniques, standards and materials that the architectural professional uses to create a space.
translation.register_description_p2: Stay up to date with the news by registering on our website. In addition, you can receive discounts through coupons that are drawn weekly.
